content: s ingle crochet beanie as seen on my kids in dozens of p revious photos materials worsted weight yarn size h or i hook chain 3 join with slip_stitch single_crochet 6 in ring round 1 2sc in each single_crochet around mark beginning of round with tail from chain cast on 12 sts round 2 *1sc in first single_crochet 2sc in next single_crochet repeat from * around round 3 *1sc in 2sc 2sc in next single_crochet repeat from * around round 4 *2sc in first single_crochet 1sc in next 3 single_crochet repeat from * around round 5 *1sc in 4sc 2sc in next single_crochet repeat from * around round 6 *2sc in first single_crochet 1sc in next 5sc repeat from *around round 7 *1sc in 6sc 2sc in next single_crochet repeat from * around round 8 *2sc in first single_crochet 1sc in next 7sc repeat from *around round 9 *1sc in 8sc 2sc in next single_crochet repeat from * around round 10 *2sc in first single_crochet 1sc in next 9sc repeat from * around round 11 *1sc in 10sc 2sc in next single_crochet repeat from *around round 12 *2sc in first single_crochet 1sc in next 11sc repeat from * around round 13 *1sc in 12sc 2sc in next single_crochet repeat from * around round 14 until the hat is the desired length single_crochet in all sts around and around and around i hope by this point you see the pattern emerging i usually go to round 13 for a mans hat round 11 for a youth or womens hat round 10 for a childs hat round 9 for a toddler hat and round 8 for a baby hat this is more of a guideline pattern you can make your first hat and then adjust the crown rounds to your desired size adding increases if needed by doing more rounds in the set pattern enjoy
